name: BOWLING CROSS: FINAL FRAME
description:
BOWLING CROSS: DARK LEGACY OF THE DEVIL BOWLER (FINAL FRAME) is the complete version of BOWLING CROSS, a weird GBC-style Battle-Bowling Action RPG - play as a roaming adventurer, using Custom Battle-Bowling Balls to knock down your enemies!

  • Bowling puns
  • Edgy anime antagonist
  • Roguelike-ish phase-based battles (Enemies/Projectiles only move while you're bowling)
  • Ball Customizer
  • Boss fights
  • A story??
  • Minigames
  • Anti-frustration features
  • Z Key / A Button: Confirm (Menu), Bowl (Hold & Release)
  • X Key / B Button: Cancel or Skip (Menu), Spirit (when Spirit meter is full), Speedup (Overworld)
  • ESC Key / Start Button: Pause
  • Arrow Keys / D-Pad: Scroll (Menu), Move
